website_summaries.verdict: Fast-working pressure cooker with a design that ensures even heat distribution.
pros: Strong locking mechanism for the lid is easy to use and gives you good performance
Aluminum base eliminates the problem of hot spots
Faster cooking than traditional methods of preparing food
Includes an impressive 8-quart capacity and is taller than many units
cons: Has no digital display, and it doesn't have push button operation

customer_reviews.title: You do not have to twist the lid.
customer_reviews.text: I have had more than several pressure cookers over the last fifteen years, but this one is the best...however that Is for cooking on high...I can't turn the heat down low enough to cook on low (but I rarely cook on low). You do not have to twist the lid, which mean the seal should last for a REALLY long time. I highly recommend this pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Dolfster

customer_reviews.title: the size
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot I purchased to cook my beans, it work wonderful. I soaked the beans then it took only 12 Minutes after the bell starting to move,I think it is when it start boiling. it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: carmen Bruni

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: This pot is wonderful. A sturdy construction with a thick heavy base and a solid lid. Iced used this pot about 8 times in the past few weeks and I have no complaints. The lid comes apart and cleans nicely. The stainless steel looks nice, and the pot works perfectly on my induction cook top.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Best gas top pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: Cooks really fast, easy to use, beautiful looks, durable. Exactly what I was looking for. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Santanu Roy

customer_reviews.title: Best pressure cooker I've EVER owned!.....
customer_reviews.text: Best pressure cooker I've EVER owned! This thing is a TANK! My Presto 8qt 6.14 lbs. This one 8.9lbs! The lid is so easy to take on and off, even Trump could do it.
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product was sent with no regulator valve. Because I didn’t open the box within a month, I cannot return it and it is unusable. Ordered part from Cuisinart and it is back ordered. I should be able to send back a nonfunctional product with missing parts regardless of timeframe. Very disappointed! Check Ur box!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pressure cooker! I bought the TFal one before this one and it was a disaster! (Leak) I sent it back (after the second one) and I bought the cuisinart. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Yves R. Almodovar

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Quality built. You will not be disappointed. Money well spent. Cook whole chicken in 15-20 minutes, and spareribs in 25 minutes Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: No instructions and no recipe book...you gotta be kidding.
customer_reviews.text: I would give the item itself high marks but we really can't because there were no instructions included. I had an Aunt who had a pressure cooker explode in her kitchen. Pressure cookers in order to be operated safely absolutely NEED INSTRUCTIONS. I also expected a set of sample recipes would be included. I'm upset. If these are sent to me and the pot performs well I will be glad to change to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: W. A. Tchmann

customer_reviews.title: Great value...
customer_reviews.text: I used to think Cuisinart was too expensive. They could charge double for this and it would still be a great value. There are so many things that are superior. And there are no negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A

customer_reviews.title: Stick easily
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking pot, however the food get stick to the bottom quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: nice pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: works like a pressure cooker should and the design seems quite safe
customer_reviews.author: MARY G.

customer_reviews.title: Built To Last
customer_reviews.text: There's no plugs, cords, thermostats, digital readouts or other electronics that will go dead at some point. This is an elegant pressure cooker that will keep going, and going, and going.
customer_reviews.author: Rita M.

product_meta.title: Cuisinart Professional Collection Stainless Pressure cooker, Medium, Silver
product_meta.description: Cook faster with the 8 qt Cuisinart professional collection stainless steel pressure cooker. This pressure cooker will cook up to 70% faster than traditional methods. Toss ingredients in the pot, seal the lid, and let the pressure do the work! you will enjoy healthy results as foods retain more of their natural vitamins and minerals than traditional cooking methods. With faster cooking times, this pressure cooker is energy efficient and consumes less energy than traditional cooking methods. Easily cook a variety of foods from soups, entrees and desserts. Features: One-handle convenience thanks to a secure open and lock lid design|Premium stainless steel offers optimal cooking performance.|Aluminum encapsulated base heats quickly and spreads heat evenly eliminating hot spots|Safe and easy pressure regulation releases steam away from user when optimal pressure is reached High low and quick release pressure settings available|Ergonomic handles provide a secure grip and ensure perfect balance|Dishwasher safe|Lifetime warranty
feature_bullets: One-handle convenience thanks to a secure open and lock lid design
Premium stainless steel offers optimal cooking performance
Aluminum encapsulated base heats quickly and spreads heat evenly, eliminating hot spots
Safe and easy pressure regulation releases steam away from user when optimal pressure is reached
High, low, and quick release pressure settings available
Ergonomic handles provide a secure grip and ensure perfect balance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
